text: Update ( Dec. 14 ) : Disney has announced that it will acquire a majority of 21st Century Fox assets, including the rights to X - Men, Avatar, FX Networks, and The Simpsons. Original story : Disney and 21st Century Fox are expected to close a deal this week giving Disney ownership over Fox ’ s TV and film properties. This means Disney will own the rights to certain Marvel franchises, such as The X - Men, Deadpool and The Fantastic Four. The film rights to Marvel Comics characters have been divided for quite some time ; Sony owns the rights to Spider - Man, for example, which meant that up until very recently, Marvel Studios couldn ’ t use Spider - Man in its movies.
